title: Dragon Child
description: In war and love danger lurks at every turn.A fire-breathing dragon, Moira O'Neal, was exchanged at birth for a Fae princess. Escaping Otherworld, she joins forces with the sexiest wereleopard on Earth. She fights the urge to mate as they battle a master of the black arts who covets their power.Major Steve Taylor, a wereleopard in the Army For Light, recognizes Moira as his mate, leaving the man at war with his cat. They partner in the middle a dangerous mission where failure means both their deaths.Cross Action Adventure/Urban Fantasy 90,000 wordsAdult MaterialSensual 4.5 out of 5
author: L.J. DeLeon
